ygData.subject: Re: Need Hunding ideas
ygData.msgSnippet: *pants* exp ooo now that s a thought  (cant wait for my next training) Anyhow got the loc of those gators *thinks it sounds like it s going to hurt alot*?
ygData.messageBody:
*pants* exp ooo now that's a thought (cant wait for my next training) Anyhow got the loc of those gators *thinks it sounds like it's going to hurt alot*?

*hugs*
Az

Jason Coan wrote:

> From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
>
> well, at 14th level you have a couple choices, money, or power level up to about 20 when you can go kill monsters that have real money. Personally I chose to power level from 12 to 20 killing gators in oasis, didn't make a dime, actually lost money due to having to buy food and water. But once I hit 20, I went to some better places where the money is great. Now I'm 28th lvl and have more money than I know what to do with. In fact I just bought a 250pp bow, spent 100pp for a SBH for a buddy of mine, spent antother 100pp equiping a buddy who lost his body and GMs refused to help, and I'm still sitting on enough for a couple pieces of real plate, and looking to spend another 400-500pp on a couple tommys. My point is, at 14th lvl, I know of nowhere to go make GREAT money, so if you can just bear to be poor for another 6 levels (which go fast killing gators), you'll be strong enough to go fight stuff that dropps several plat at a time....at which point you'll be quickly equip yourself then wonder "where to I spend all this money?" :)
>
> >>> <suzkim@...> 5.19.99 12:53:01 PM >>>
> From: suzkim@...
>
> Greetings,
>
> Currently 14th level Barbarian Warrior. Need some ideas of where to hunt
> for exp AND money. Usually hunt with a group of 4 others 12/13 range. We
> are itching to travel so any ideas would be great.
>
> *hugs*
>
> Azlana, Barbarian Warrior of Veeshan
